channel.title: Help with kali Linux
channel.description: Hello im new here and im trying to learn more about linux and how to use linux and every tool it has, is there a guide book or someone who can teach me most of it if not all.

item.title: Help with kali Linux

item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with kali Linux
item.dc:creator: pry0cc
item.description:
My biggest suggestion is to try out HackTheBox.eu.

Go there, make an account, and get a VIP pass, it’s really one of the best platforms for beginners to learn how to use their tools properly in a legal environment.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with kali Linux
item.dc:creator: mdeez
item.description:
There is no substitute for hands-on learning. Check out https://www.root-me.org/en/Challenges. One of the things that is really great about it is that many of the challenges have links to useful learning resources (docs, talks, blog posts, ect). Once you complete a challenge I highly recommend looking at the submitted solutions to see how others have done it. I’ve personally learned quite a bit from that.

There are a lot of other useful sites too. There are some great “awesome lists” on github. https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome#security is a really good list. There are more resources there than you could reasonably get through. Just follow your interests.

Read full topic

item.description:
Do you know a site that will teach me about penetration testing

item.title: Help with kali Linux
item.dc:creator: ricksanchez
item.description:
First of all welcome! Secondly I have to something right away. There won’t be ‘someone’ that teaches you how to use (Kali) Linux.
Especially Kali Linux is meant as a penetration testing system, hence it includes a ton of different tools for different tasks…

If you would have searched a bit you would have found the kali linux revealed book that probably is a decent start if you really want to know about Kali Linux. If you want to learn penetration testing and utilize the tools there are other ways to learn …

Read full topic
